benchmark_details.name: coq-facts-props-proofs
benchmark_details.overview: This dataset is specifically designed to enhance LLMs’ proficiency in interpreting and generating Coq code, derived from a collection of over 10,000 Coq source files, and includes propositions, proofs, and definitions with associated metadata.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To advance the integration of machine learning and artificial intelligence within the realm of formal theorem proving, enhancing LLMs’ capabilities in processing and generating Coq code.

data.source: A diverse array of repositories within the Coq community, covering foundational libraries, formalized mathematical theorems, and algorithm implementations.
data.annotation: Manually curated and pre-processed using a customized OCaml parser.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are evaluated based on the models' outputs for correctness and logical coherence in Coq syntax.
methodology.interpretation: Results are interpreted through the lens of model performance in generating valid Coq proofs.
methodology.validation: Fine-tuning conducted with initial exploratory experiments to assess model outputs.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: The dataset includes copies of original license files and adheres to various open-source licenses ensuring legal compliance.
